Text.Page:
Greetings, strange champion. I am Kaia, Guardian Goddess of this land.

As the walls that once sealed Manahan weaken, creatures from other realms are invading this one.

You must stop these creatures from destroying the walls.

The Underworld Shadow's power should help restore the wall.

This Shadow Mana should help restore the wall.

I thank you for your help.
If the wall breaks down, both your world and this one are doomed.
